name: Chat 2
system_prompt: You are a helpful AI assistant.

messages.content: Hello! It's nice to meet you. Is there something I can help you with or would you like to chat?

No, I don't actually know your name. I'm a new conversation each time you interact with me, so we haven't had any previous interactions that would allow me to retain information about you. How can I help you today?
It's nice to meet you, Ramez! What brings you here today? Is there something on your mind that you'd like to talk about or ask for help with? I'm all ears!

I can store our conversation for a short period of time, so if we start over and don't explicitly tell me your name again, I might be able to recall that you mentioned it earlier. However, please keep in mind that my memory is limited to the current conversation session, and I won't retain any information beyond that.

If I don't remember your name when we pick up where we left off, feel free to remind me, Ramez!
